characters.description: A collection of all characters in the game, defining their properties, abilities, and behaviors.

ability.description: A reference to a card for this character's ability.

animator.description: Reference to the character's animation controller. (Not Implemented)

artist.description: The artist who created the character art.

ascends_train_automatically.description: Whether this character automatically moves up the train when possible.

attack_damage.description: Base damage dealt by this character's attacks.

attack_teleports_to_defender.description: Whether this character teleports to its target when attacking.

attack_vfx.description: Visual effect played when this character attacks.

block_visual_size_increase.description: Block the unit from growing when its size increases from upgrades.

boss_action_groups.description: List of action groups for flying boss characters. (Not implemented)

boss_room_cast_vfx.description: Visual effect played in the room when this boss character casts an ability.

boss_spell_cast_vfx.description: Visual effect played when this boss character casts an ability.

boss_titan_affinity.description: For a boss character its affinity with titans. Effects the freeze room effet.

can_attack.description: Whether this character can perform attacks.

can_be_healed.description: Whether this character can be healed.

character_art.description: Reference to the character's art asset.

character_sound_data.description: Reference to the character's sound data. (Not implemented)

chatter.description: Reference to the character's dialogue data.

chosen_variant.description: Whether this is a chosen variant of the character. Setting this to true sets the chosen property in the shader.

death_slides_backwards.description: Whether this character slides backward when dying.

death_type.description: Type of death animation to play.

death_vfx.description: Visual effect played when this character dies.

disable_in_daily_challenges.description: Whether this character is disabled in daily challenges.

endless_stats.description: Stats for this character in endless mode (This is only used by enemy units).

enemy_relic.description: Reference to a relic (SinsData) for the enemy's relic data.

equipment_limit.description: Maximum number of equipment this character can have.

grafted_equipment.description: Reference to an equipment card for this character's grafted equipment.

hide_in_logbook.description: Whether this character should be hidden in the logbook.

impact_vfx.description: Visual effect played when this character is hit.

is_mini_boss.description: Whether this character is a mini-boss.

is_outer_train_boss.description: Whether this character is an outer train boss.

is_pyre_heart.description: Whether this character is the Pyre.

loops_between_train_floors.description: Whether this character loops between train floors (bypassing the pyre room).

lore_tooltips.description: List of lore tooltips for this character.

names.description: Localized text for this character's name.

override.description: Whether this character overrides an existing character with the same ID (requires the Unity Asset Name).

prevent_abilities_from_equipment.description: Prevents ability from being overwritten by equipment

projectile_vfx.description: Visual effect played for this character's projectiles.

pyre_heart_data.description: Reference to the Pyre heart data (not implemented yet).

room_modifiers.description: List of room modifiers this character applies.

items.description: Reference to a room modifier's unique identifier.

size.description: Size of this character in the room.

starting_status_effects.description: List of status effects this character starts with.

status_effect_immunities.description: List of status effects this character is immune to.

subtypes.description: List of subtypes this character belongs to.

triggers.description: List of Character triggers this character has.

items.description: Reference to a defined character trigger.

valid_boss_attack_phase.description: For a flying boss, this determines when they are able to attack. (Think Daedalus vs Talos from MT1. Talos attacks during the fight, Daedalus doesn't).

items.description: A character definition that specifies all properties and behaviors of a character in the game.
